item.title: My Cat Buddy ğŸˆ
item.description:
Adopt a pet from Guadalupe County Animal Control

My Cat Buddy ğŸ±

Buddy is a tabby cat from Mesilla Park, New Mexico. He likes to play catch with springs and eat fish. See #caturday on my insta, X, and threads. Buddy and Bryan both appreciate your donations to, and adoptions from:

Guadalupe County Animal Control Phone: 505-472-3711
Santa Rosa Animal Shelter, 117 S. 5th Street, Santa Rosa, New Mexico 88435

item.title: New England Patriots Fandom ğŸˆ
item.description:
New England Patriots Fandom ğŸˆ

My first football memory was rooting for the 1985 patriots as they got pummeled in the super bowl-

In elementary we were the Ronald Reagan Patriots

In rural New Mexico, the Drew Bledsoe era patriots had superior coverage to any other team as the world’s first pro sports website and world’s original podcast

I mowed lawns dreaming unrealistically of getting to visit old foxboro stadium
